程序包 edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u20.hek2liaoy3wangy58yaol4.project.ChineseChess

类 Position

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.u20.hek2liaoy3wangy58yaol4.project.ChineseChess.Position
所有已实现的接口:
java.io.Serializable
public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
this class implements a "position" on the Chinese chess board that allows the user to place a piece on that

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Position

      public Position​(int x_coord, int y_coord)
      the constructor of a position, which initialize the position without a piece
      参数:
      x_coord - the x coordinate of the position
      y_coord - the y coordinate of the position

  • 方法详细资料

    • hasPiece

      public boolean hasPiece()
      getter of whether this position is taken
      返回:
      true if this position is taken, false otherwise

    • getX

      public int getX()
      getter of x_coordinate
      返回:
      x the x coordinate

    • getY

      public int getY()
      getter of y_coordinate
      返回:
      y the y coordinate

    • getXLen

      public int getXLen()
      get the len of the x axis
      返回:
      the x axis length

    • getYLen

      public int getYLen()
      get the len of the y axis
      返回:
      the y axis length

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(Board b)
      set the board with the correct x and y length
      参数:
      b - passed a board class to the position

    • setHasPiece

      public void setHasPiece​(boolean tf)
      setter of the hasPiece boolean
      参数:
      tf - the boolean to be loaded

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece​(Piece p, Board b)
      place the piece p on this (position) on the board b
      参数:
      p - passed a piece class to the position
      b - passed a Board class to the position

    • scaleBoardPosition

      public void scaleBoardPosition()
      place the piece p on this (position) on the board b

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece()
      getter of the piece on this position
      返回:
      the piece if has one or null otherwise

    • removePiece

      public void removePiece​(Piece p, Board b)
      remove the piece on this position if possible
      参数:
      p - piece to be removed
      b - board that contains this piece
